article_title: The Outlook: Services Sector Gauge Finally Gets Its Due
article_text:
A quarterly reading from the Commerce Department has quietly emerged as one of the most consequential government reports, with the power to roil estimates for U.S. economic growth and the impact of the Affordable Care Act.

The Quarterly Services Survey, or QSS, measures revenue at service-providing companies including hospitals, day-care centers and law offices. It usually attracts little notice even as reports on freight-rail traffic...
